about_the_game:
Welcome to BeachHead Rogue, the latest stand-alone addition to the popular BeachHead game series! In this new Rogue-Like adventure, players can dive into an immersive gameplay experience packed with powerful abilities, unique weapons, and endless strategic possibilities.
Assemble and upgrade your skill set to master the defenses of BeachHead against the merciless forces of Musso Khan.

BeachHead Rogue brings you the thrill of infinite gameplay variations while staying true to the original BeachHead spirit. With a focus on experience points (XP), attribute cards, and a dynamic asset marketplace, BeachHead Rogue redefines the gameplay experience, delivering new levels of excitement, depth, and fluidity.

Key Features:

  • Strategic Card-Based Abilities: Choose from a vast collection of attribute cards, each designed to enhance different aspects of your playstyle. Test various card builds to find the perfect combination that best suits your approach.

  • Customized Power Progression: Boost your character’s strength by focusing on a curated set of powerful ability cards. Focusing on a select few abilities with high-level improvements offers more impact than spreading upgrades across a larger, less potent set.

  • Diverse Weaponry: Equip yourself with an arsenal of weapons tailored for every strategy, from close-range combat to long-distance takedowns, allowing for an adaptable approach against enemy forces.

  • Dynamic Marketplace: Access an evolving marketplace for in-game assets, giving you the opportunity to upgrade your character and gear as you progress through challenging stages.

Gameplay Overview:

In BeachHead Rogue, players have the freedom to mix and match ability cards to build their ultimate defense strategy. Experiment with different combinations to see which cards amplify your strengths, whether you favor speed, power, or a more balanced approach. As you progress, gaining experience and resources allows you to upgrade these abilities, sharpening your strategy and making you an unstoppable force against Musso Khan’s armies.

Prepare to enter a world of endless possibility and adventure. BeachHead Rogue awaits—where will your strategy take you?

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 SUPER/AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
